title: the Minister for Health conferred on him by or under the enactments specified
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (delegation ministerial functions) (no 2) order 2023

title: the Minister for Health conferred on him by or under the enactments specified
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Health conferred on him by or under the enactments specified 
in the Schedule are delegated to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the 
Department of Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [141] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister health conferred enactment specified schedule delegated mary butler minister state department health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th march 2023 141 3

title: the Minister for Health conferred on him by or under the enactments specified
heading: Mental Health Acts 2001 to 2018
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Mental Health Acts 2001 to 2018 

Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2006 (No. 11 of 2006) 

Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2010 (No. 40 of 2010) 

Sections 32 and 35 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 
2009) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 March, 2023. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Tánaiste. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [141]
text_norm: schedule mental health act 2001 2018 criminal law (insanity) act 2006 (no 11 2006) criminal law (insanity) act 2010 (no 40 2010) section 32 35 nursing home support scheme act 2009 (no 15 2009) given official seal government 21 march 2023 micheal martin tanaiste 4 141

title: the Minister for Health conferred on him by or under the enactments specified
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023 delegates 
to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department of Health the statutory 
powers and duties of the Minister for Health mentioned in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 [141] 5
